post.author: Kelly Lee
post.content:
Quality Assurance/Beta Manager

Careers that know no boundaries.

AOL Canada Inc. is a strategic alliance between America Online, Inc., the world뭩 leader in interactive services and Royal Bank, Canada뭩 premier global financial services group. Working in our dynamic, creative and stimulating environment you will have the opportunity to influence how the Internet impacts on the world. Check out the following opportunity that we have to offer and prepare for a career without limits.


Quality Assurance/Beta Manager

THE JOB

뷢anage a Team of 4-6 QA Test / Beta Staff
뷝iring, Training and Development of QA Test / Beta Staff
뷢anage an English and French software BETA program
뷢anage all aspects of QA Testing: GUI testing, functionality testing, performance/stress testing, system and regression testing, and integration testing
뷡ead development and execution of Test Plans, Test Cases/Suites by the team
뷡ead bug scrubs
뷢anage the implementation of a new Development and QA Test Lab
뷒utomate the Testing Process with Test Tools and Techniques
뷞mplement new Test Processes and QA Standards
뷧egularly Track ColQuality Levels of software products
뷙ffective collaboration with Product Management, Project Management, Technology Development (local and in the US) and Customer Support
뷧eporting and Presenting of QA Testing Results
뷒pplication of Statistics and statistical methods to QA Testing where appropriate
뷥ossess and Demonstrate Strong Written and Verbal/Presentation Skills
뷖ommit to additional hours when required for urgent project completion from time to time
뷥ossess and Demonstrate excellent organizational, prioritization and analytical skills
뷥articipate in the selection process for new hires for Technology and Development department
뷝ands-on management of the QA Test / Beta staff: coaching, counseling, evaluations, and discipline

SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED

Technology Experience Requirements:
뷤ne or more of Test Automation Tools: Mercury WinRunner, Rational TestStudio/Robot, Seque SilkTest, Compuware QACentre, Empirix/RSW eTest Suite
뷞nternet Technologies (HTML, XML/XSL, etc.) and Standards
뷖onfiguration Management Technology (CVS, Visual SourceSafe or RCS)
뷓ug Tracking Technology (Bugzilla, Vantive)
뷥lus to have experience with all phases of software/web application design, development testing
뷥lus to have Programming experience with Visual Basic/Visual C++, C/C++, Java
뷭indows 95/98/Me/2000/XP
뷫NIX (Solaris, Linux)
뷧DBMS (Sybase, Oracle)

Work Experience:
?+ years of QA Management of at least 3-4 person QA team
뷥referably some previous experience with coordinating BETA programs
?+ years of Project Management
?+ years of a QA Experience
?+ years of software development Experience
Preferably experience with managing/operating a QA Test Lab

Special Requirements:

Education:
뷓achelors Degree in Computer Science, MIS, Engineering or related Technical Degree


REWARDS

AOL Canada has a lively team environment and deploys state of the art technology . We offer a competitive compensation package and excellent benefits, along with an outstanding career opportunity. Apply your skills with a worldwide leader and experience the rewards we have to offer.

Please send your resume with salary history in confidence to Human Resources Department, Recruiter, AOL Canada; e-mail llhawke@aol.com

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: LH 41  

Contact Information
llhawke@aol.com
AOL Canada
55 St. Clair Ave West
Toronto
post.title: Quality Assurance - Beta Manager
